question: American aerospace and defence giant "Lockheed Martin" has decided to set up its new F-16 jet production unit in which country?
explanation: Lockheed Martin has announced the setting up of F-16 jet production unit in India. Lockheed Martin is an American aerospace and defence giant. It said that, the F-16 jet production unit to be set up in India will be an exclusive one and will be in line with the 'Make in India' initiative. Lockheed Martin has assured to relocate its entire production line to India. It said that, the unit will not be a mere assembly line. It will be a better facility that has never been provided by any other fighter aircraft manufacturer earlier.
